alert.note: Alert for Dorchester (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Dorchester County through 445 PM EDT... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Cambridge, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cambridge, University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies, Church Creek, Brookview, Andrews, Hudson, Crocheron, Honga, Wingate, Lloyds, Taylors Island, Woolford, Bucktown and Linkwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
